titleStmt.title: A Letter of an Independent to his honoured friend in London
titleStmt.author: Swadlin, Thomas, 1600-1670.

notesStmt.note: This item appears in Wing as L1571. Wing S6220A has title: letter of an Independent to his honoured friend Mr Glyn. Wing attributes S6220A to Thomas Swadlin.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
